subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes properties that configure the **ArrayStore**.

properties.name: ArrayStore
properties.description: The **ArrayStore** is a store that provides an interface for loading and editing an in-memory array and handling related events.

Methods.name: byKey(key)
Methods.description: Gets a data item with a specific key.

Methods.name: createQuery()
Methods.description: Creates a **Query** for the underlying array.
